BIO

Hello and Welcome to my portfolio website!

I'm Kevin, a multi-faceted creative with a passion for Web Development, Programming, Photography, and Digital Content Creator. This space is where I invite you to explore my journey, work, and the diverse range of skills I bring to the table.

Standard Chartered Bank Vietnam

Data Analyst

As a former data analyst at Standard Chartered Bank, I spent years immersed in the world of numbers and statistics. Analyzing complex models to derive meaningful insights and make informed decisions was my daily bread. This experience honed my analytical skills and instilled in me a deep appreciation for the power of data-driven decision-making. However, my journey didn't stop there.
